section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In the second case, 521, for reasons stated in an opinion filed this morning with the clerk, the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the opinion in this case and in the preceding case No. 2066.
Mr. Justice Stevens took no part in the consideration or decisions of either of these two cases.
